submission_guidelines.requirements: Papers must be written in English and follow Springer’s Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS) format. Contributions should be original and not submitted elsewhere.

scope_and_topics: Applications of formal methods in software/hardware design, development, testing, and intelligent systems
Experience reports on teaching/application of formal methods

publication.post_conference: Accepted papers will be published in a volume of LNCS and a consent-to-publish form will be required.
publication.special_issue: There may be a special issue of the Science of Computer Programming Journal (Elsevier) featuring selected and extended papers from the conference.
